title: Every time I get into champion select my screen is black.
body:
I can talk to everyone fine, while this is going on. Clubs N all.
But I just cant connect to champion select.

replies.body:
same I put up a report about it a while ago on help and support hope they listen to it. 
and just to let you know this is a help & support issue.

yeah ive had this a couple times since 6.1x actually. has just required me nuking the client away and reinstalling and all was fine again. happened 5 times since the 6.1x patch to my memory, hasnt happened in this patch (yet). i was thinking driver issues, but im not sure

Ran a repair on my client, restarted router/computer.
Everything's fine now.
